abort.single_instance_allowed: Vain yksi posti- ja pakettien kokoonpano on sallittu.

error.communication: Ei voida muodostaa yhteyttä tai kirjautua sisään postipalvelimeen. Tarkista lokista yksityiskohdat.

data.imap_timeout: Time in seconds before connection timeout (seconds, minimum 10)
data.amazon_days: Days back to check for Amazon emails

config_2.description:
Viimeistele kokoonpano mukauttamalla seuraava sähköpostirakenteen ja Home Assistant -asennuksen perusteella. 

 Lisätietoja [Posti ja paketit-integroinnista] (https://github.com/moralmunky/Home-Assistant-Mail-And-Packages/wiki/Configuration-and-Email-Settings#configuration) -asetuksista on [kokoonpano, mallit , ja automaatiot-osio] (https://github.com/moralmunky/Home-Assistant-Mail-And-Packages/wiki/Configuration-and-Email-Settings#configuration) GitHubissa.
config_2.title: Posti ja paketit (vaihe 2/2)

options_3.description:
Enter the path and file name to your custom no mail image below.

Example: images/custom_nomail.gif
options_3.title: Mail and Packages (Step 3 of 3)

reconfigure.description: Please enter the connection information of your mail server.
reconfigure.title: Mail and Packages (Step 1 of 2)

data.imap_timeout: Time in seconds before connection timeout (seconds, minimum 10)
data.amazon_days: Days back to check for Amazon emails

reconfig_2.description:
Finish the configuration by customizing the following based on your email structure and Home Assistant installation.

For details on the [Mail and Packages integration](https://github.com/moralmunky/Home-Assistant-Mail-And-Packages/wiki/Configuration-and-Email-Settings#configuration) options review the [configuration, templates, and automations section](https://github.com/moralmunky/Home-Assistant-Mail-And-Packages/wiki/Configuration-and-Email-Settings#configuration) on GitHub.

If using Amazon forwarded emails please seperate each address with a comma or enter (none) to clear this setting.
reconfig_2.title: Mail and Packages (Step 2 of 2)

reconfig_3.description:
Enter the path and file name to your custom no mail image below.

Example: images/custom_nomail.gif
reconfig_3.title: Mail and Packages (Step 3 of 3)

error.communication: Ei voida muodostaa yhteyttä tai kirjautua sisään postipalvelimeen. Tarkista lokista yksityiskohdat.

data.imap_timeout: Aika sekunteina ennen yhteyden aikakatkaisua (sekuntia, vähintään 10)
data.amazon_days: Days back to check for Amazon emails
